item.description:
Hi all,
Setting this event up for Tammy. Details are below. Please email her directly (by finding her in the members list) if you have any questions.

Home Spa party from 3-5:30/6
Dinner afterwards on Moody Street in Waltham

This is a girls only event - get pampered then go out for drinks and dinner!
item.name: Home Spa Party at Tammy's - Girls Only!
